# Gingerbread
Gingerbreads are a species of sentient confectionary, with sugar for blood and cookies for flesh.
## Cookie Biology
Thanks to their anomalous sugar-based biology, Gingerbreads have sugar instead of blood, and can restore blood by eating candies and other sugary foods. They also take 50% less [color=#ec3a3a]Heat[/color] damage from fire, and are completely immune to [color=#ec3a3a]Asphyxiation[/color], [color=#ec3a3a]Bloodloss[/color], [color=#ec3a3a]Cold[/color], and [color=#ec3a3a]Cellular[/color] damage! However, others might be tempted to butcher their corpses for a source of delicious, sugary cookies...
## Damage
Gingerbreads take 50% more [color=#ec3a3a]Blunt[/color] damage than other species, as they're more fragile and more likely to crumble. They are also injured when splashed with water, becoming soggy and limp.
